inn1.comm: his first ball is on the fuller side around off stump, Jayawardene stays in his crease, gets behind the line, and defends
a bit straighter this time, on middle and leg, and at a heady pace, Jayawardene nudges close on the leg side and calls Dilshan through for a quick single
143 kph and Pattinson gets away with a loose ball, it was a full toss down leg side and Dilshan didn't connect with the leg glance
he hasn't got away with this one, a full ball on off stump, there to be driven, and Dilshan crunches it off the front foot through cover
a full toss on off stump and Dilshan plays it to mid-off
Dilshan voices his disappointment at not hitting this ball for four. It was full and on the pads, and Dilshan missed the flick. It was a bit too quick
good length on off and middle, Dilshan stays in his crease and defends on the off side
Hilfenhaus delivers a full ball down leg side from over the wicket, Jayawardene misses the flick, and the ball brushes the pad on its way through to Wade
delicious drive, the ball was a wide half volley and Jayawardene sent it to the cover boundary with a languid swing of the bat
wide outside off again but this time Jayawardene can't beat cover with the drive

a direct hit and Jayawardene is gone! He jumped on the back foot and opened the face to play the ball towards slip. I think it was Dilshan who called for a very risky single and Jayawardene responded after a moment's hesitation. Hussey from second slip pounced on the ball with one hand and let rip at the bowler's end, his direct hit finding Mahela so far out of his crease that the third umpire wasn't needed.
Hilfenhaus nips the ball back into Dilshan from a good length and hits the pad, a touch high
good length outside off stump, the batsman lets it go
full ball around middle and off, played on the off side
good length angling across the left-hander, Sangakkara pushes forward and lets it go
full delivery on off stump, Pattinson's looking for swing, Sangakkara presses forward and punches towards mid-off
short of a length on the hips, Sangakkara moves across and tries to glance, he plays the ball behind square
full ball on off and middle, Dilshan plays on the off side
that was a quick ball, 146 kph just outside off, Dilshan let it go close to his stumps
Hilfenhaus tests Sangakkara with a bouncer, the batsman ducks
short of a length and straight, Sangakkara stays in his crease and defends
short of a length with no room for Sanga, he stays in his crease and plays on the off side
this time Sangakkara has the space to close the face of his bat and collect a single towards midwicket
played off the pads towards midwicket
pushed wide of mid-on for a single
that's a half-volley outside off and Dilshan has crashed it through covers with a fierce drive, that was hit from the crease
straighter and Dilshan defends straight back
slightly shorter length, on a good line and Dilshan gets behind the line to defend
pitched up and angling in. Dilshan defends
again on the off-stump line and Dilshan again just punches to mid-off

There's Pattinson's reward. After four balls on off stump, this one is in the corridor outside it, bowled from slightly wider on the crease. It was a bit shorter too and bounced and straightened just a fraction. Dilshan had to go onto the back foot and was surprised by the bounce as much as the change in line. He just poked at it and got a thin edge through to the keeper
nice line on off stump and Sangakkara defends
pushed into the off side and the batsmen can run two
punched to mid-off
slower through the air but Sanga is not fooled. Waits for it and just pushes to cover
wide of off stump this time and Sangakkara leaves it alone
Hilf is hitting the off-stump line with almost annoying accuracy. As if to tease Sanga the last one was outside off, and then this one is right back on off. Sanga defends
Pattinson looking to really fire it in but ends up overpitching. Chandimal picks it up from middle stump and flicks to fine leg
again looking for extra pace ends up pushing it too wide of off stump and Sanga leaves
shorter length and Sangakkara goes on the back foot and pats it down
Sanga just punches down the ground. Sweet timing and they get three
good off-stump line and Chandimal defends
on off stump again and Chandimal pushes to cover
short of a length on off and Sanga defends off the back foot
similar ball and Sanga defends again
slightly fuller and Sanga pushes to mid-off
Hilf hits the off-stump line again and Sanga pushes to cover. It's like a bowling machine this accuracy
slightly more width but not quite enough for Sanga to free his arms. Pushes to cover
a bit of width again and Sanga cuts, but without conviction and the ball is smartly fielded at point
short of a length in the off-stump channel and Sanga punches off the back foot to cover point
angled in and Chandimal pushes to mid-on
there's width finally and Chandimal has a slash at it. Doesn't time it perfectly so gets three instead of a boundary
on middle stump and Sanga flicks to wide of mid-on for a single
there's the famous slower ball and Chandimal just pats it down
angled in at off stump and Chandimal pushes to cover
good length delivery just outside of stump, played off the back foot towards the off side

shot! and saved! Sangakkara drove a full ball hard and straight, Hilfenhaus was moving to his left on his follow through but he managed to stop and dive across the pitch to stop the ball with one hand
defended on the off side
Sangakkara opens the face to steer the ball towards point where Warner mis-fields and lets the ball go through him
short of a length on the pads, worked towards deep square for a single
that's not that short but Chandimal was quickly into position and pulled the ball through midwicket to end the mandatory Powerplay with a boundary
good length pitching outside off and angling across the left-hander, Sangakkara lets it go through to Wade
Sangakkara once again plays an outstanding straight drive but McKay gets down low in his follow through and gets a hand on the ball to prevent a boundary
played from the crease towards point
Sangakkara moves forward and cuts the ball behind point towards third man
short and wide outside off, Chandimal goes after the ball, trying to slash it over point, he gets a thick top edge that flies towards third man
the line is on the pads and Sangakkara glances towards fine leg
bowled flat and full, angling into the left-hander, pushed towards long-on for a single
flat from round the wicket again, Chandimal towards point for a single
Sangakkara turns the ball off his pads behind square
slightly short, Chandimal goes back in his crease and cuts through point
Sangakkara stays in his crease, waits for the ball to angle into him, and then taps it off his pads through midwicket
that's short and wide outside off and Chandimal slaps the ball to the fielder on the cover boundary
width given outside off and Chandimal slashes, getting a thick edge towards third man, the ball reaches the fielder on one bounce
Sangakkara pushes the ball with a straight bat towards the bowler, that wasn't hit as firmly as the drives to Hilfenhaus and McKay, so Christian had an easier save to make
played from the crease towards point
short of a length and Sangakkara moves across his crease and taps the ball towards square leg
played from the crease once again towards point, by the right-hander this time
defended towards the bowler, Christian begins with an economical over
short of a length and outside off, Sangakkara carves it flat but over the fielder at point
straighter line from Watson, Sangakkara stays in his crease and plays awkwardly on the off side
short of a length outside off, Sangakkara moves across his crease and punches towards mid-off
fuller length on middle stump, Sangakkara stays on the back foot and plays to mid-on
good length at 133kph, Sangakkara opens the face and plays towards point
defended towards cover from the crease

he's teed off! Chandimal moved his front leg out of the way and used the length and the width - full and outside off - to cart the ball down the ground with a full swing of the arms, the ball crashed into the sightscreen
defended on the leg side
good length and straight, Chandimal defends on the off side
short and wide outside off, Chandimal cuts hard but I think the fielder at point may have taken some pace off the ball. Doherty runs across from third man to field at deep point
Sangakkara taps the ball towards point and sprints
Chandimal strides forward and defends a good length ball on the off side

Chandimal's stranded mid pitch but the throw misses at the bowler's end! David Hussey doesn't hit this time. Sangakkara had played the ball straight to midwicket and Chandimal set off, Sangakkara didn't want the run. Chandimal was in the middle of the pitch when he turned around and his only chance was if the throw missed. It did.
defended on the off side
Sangakkara moves forward and drives the ball on the up through extra cover, he played that through the line
turned off the hips towards square leg for one more
good length and straight, Sangakkara plays the ball back to the bowler
Sangakkara moves forward and pushes the ball past Watson towards mid-off
Sangakkara gets on top of the bounce of a short of a length ball and opens the face to steer towards third man
good length and very straight, Chandimal plays with soft hands towards midwicket and Sangakkara initiates a quick single
short of a length with width outside off, Sangakkara moves forward and frees his arms, square driving the ball through point for four
defended back to the bowler
Sangakkara moves forward, pushes towards mid-on and runs immediately, the fielder doesn't pick up cleanly

loud appeal for lbw but Asad Rauf says not out. That ball nipped into the right-hander from a good length and hit the pad. Possibly a bit high? Maybe an inside edge? I'll have to wait for replays. There was an inside edge as Chandimal closed the face.
played towards point
pushed off the front foot towards mid-off
Sangakkara drives the ball from the crease towards midwicket where Doherty doesn't make a clean save and allows the single
full ball on middle stump, Chandimal leans across and plays to midwicket

that's not short, but Chandimal moves slightly towards the off and heaves the ball with a short-arm pull off the front foot. He hit it flat and in the air between midwicket and mid-on. Chandimal is a little bundle of class.
fuller length on off stump, Chandimal defends on the off side
Sangakkara tries to hit down the ground but gets an inside edge towards midwicket, the ball was fullish and straight
short of a length with a little width, that's all Sangakkara needs. He slaps the ball with power off the front foot through cover
a slower ball outside off, Sangakkara reads it, plays with soft hands close on the off side, and runs
good length and straight, defended back to the bowler
short of a length on off stump, dropped close on the off side for a quick single
ah this time Sangakkara doesn't find the gap. The ball was there to be driven - full outside off - and Sangakkara did so, but hit it to the fielder at cover, David Hussey.
good length and straight, Chandimal plays the ball towards mid-on
a slower ball but it's full and on leg stump, Chandimal plays off his pads through square leg
good length and straight, Chandimal gets behind the line and blocks
Sangakkara waits in his crease and opens the face to play the ball towards third man
a slower short ball, Chandimal swivels and pulls towards deep midwicket, Peter Forrest has a lot of ground to cover and he covers it swiftly
played from the crease towards midwicket
Sanga uses the angle into him and turns the ball off his pads behind square
Sangakkara drops the ball at his feet and responds to Chandimal's quick call, Warner was the fielder closest to the ball but they took him on
that's a super slow ball out of the back of the hand at 108kph, Chandimal gets beaten by the change of pace but the ball brushes his pad and goes towards fine leg
another slow ball and this time Chandimal plays it towards fine leg off the back foot
Chandimal closes the face of the bat to play the ball through square
Sangakkara mis-times the hit through cover and the ball plugs into the ground close on the off side, Chandimal sprints through
Sangakkara moves forward and plays the ball off his pads towards square
Chandimal charges and tries to hit down the ground, he gets an inside edge that goes towards fine leg
driven from the crease through cover, Doherty is bowling them flat and straight
slower through the air this time, Chandimal taps on the off side and they sprint another single
worked off the pads behind square for another single, Sri Lanka reach 100
nudged from the crease towards third man, more quick running between the wickets
from around the wicket, McKay bowls it in the channel outside off and Sanga pushes to cover point
room outside off and Sangakkara drives but there's a sweeper out on the off side
slower ball, short outside off and Chandimal guides it to third man
in the channel outside off, Sanga opens the face at the last moment and gets a single to third man
angled across, Chandimal looks to play straight but goes off the inside half of the bat to midwicket
slower and outside off. Chandimal guides it to third man and brings up 1000 runs in ODI cricket
tremendous hit, tremendous! Chandimal gets under a flighted ball by coming a long way out of his crease and lofts the ball into the stands behind the midwicket boundary
and now he sensibly drives the ball towards long off to rotate strike
worked off the pads through square leg for a single
bowled flat and wide outside off, Chandimal drives to the fielder on the sweeper boundary
played towards square leg
whoops, Sangakkara lost grip on his bat as he played that on the leg side and the bat flew in the air behind the keeper, could have been hit wicket there
left alone outside off stump
Chandimal gets an inside edge on to the pad towards the leg side
Chandimal gets to his half-century by glancing the ball off his pads towards fine leg. Impressive innings from an impressive youngster. The crowd gives him a huge cheer.
short of a length outside off, Sangakkara steers to third man and the crowd cheers again because Sanga's got to his fifty. It's the 100 run stand as well. Sri Lanka steaming ahead.
Chandimal waits on the back foot and slaps a short of a length ball in front of point
the slower ball from round the stumps, Sangakkara moves across his stumps and nudges behind square
Sangakkara goes back and drives the ball towards long-on
bowled flat and fast, towards the blockhole, Chandimal stays in his crease and plays to mid-on
played from the crease towards square leg
pushed with soft hands close on the off side for a quick single
Sangakkara winds up, targets the square leg boundary, and sends the ball there with a powerful sweep from just outside off stump
he tries to sweep again but this time gets a top edge that lobs in the air over the keeper
short of a length angling into the right-hander, Chandimal stays in his crease and defends on the off side, they decide against the quick single
fuller ball on off and middle, played towards midwicket
Sangakkara moves slightly across and works the length ball through backward square
short of a length outside off, Chandimal rides the bounce and cuts behind point towards third man
Sangakkara move forward to drive the ball and sprints the single after the bowler fails to stop it
short ball, Chandimal was on the front foot and he pulled it along the ground towards deep midwicket, they run two before Michael Hussey's throw comes in
played off the front foot towards midwicket
Sangakkara comes out of his crease and dabs the ball towards long on
punched from the crease towards long off for a single
quicker ball on the stumps, Sangakkara moves back and swats the ball through midwicket
flicked off the pads through square leg
driven off the front foot towards long-on, superb milking of the spinner
length ball on the pads, easy for Sangakkara to glance towards fine leg
good length on off stump, Chandimal stays in his crease and defends on the off side
fuller length on middle and leg, Chandimal stays put and nudges the ball behind square
Sangakkara stays in his crease and plays a good length ball towards cover
good length and straight, defended on the back foot towards the bowler

caught at deep square leg! Short of a length delivery that hurried Sangakkara who began to swivel pull but then checked his shot, the ball went off the top edge high in the air and straight to Peter Forrest. The partnership ends on 123, it's been a splendid one.
played from the crease towards point
Thirimanne uses his feet, comes out of his crease, and plays towards long-on
Chandimal pushes the ball in front of point on the front foot and continues running, he slides into his crease on both knees and arches back, like a footballer would celebrate a goal
Thirinamme lunges forward and sweeps through square leg
defended on the off side
played off the front foot towards long on
played with soft hands on the off side for a quick single
Thirimanne drops the ball behind the stumps but Wade is quick to the ball and prevents the single
Thirimanne swishes outside off and gets beaten, it's been a while since someone got beaten
played from the crease into the gap at cover for a single
another one beats the bat now, Chandimal was looking to guide a fullish ball towards third man
and again, Chandimal tries to steer towards third man and misses, the ball was quick and on a good length outside off
full ball angling across Thirimanne, who drives to drive but gets beaten
Thirimanne tries to cut off the front foot but is beaten once again, everything's beating the bat now.
and again, Thirimanne goes after a wide delivery but misses the drive

there's an appeal for a run out after a direct hit from Warner. But Thirimanne's just safe, just. Thirimanne played the ball with soft hands behind point and ran, Warner swooped on it and let the throw rip at the bowler's end. The batsman was in by a frame.
a slower ball, played towards long on for a single
driven off the front foot through the off side for one more
Thirimanne works the ball off his pads towards midwicket
shot! Thirimanne makes a bit of room by moving towards leg and drives a length ball through extra cover, Michael Hussey runs to his left and dives to save a run
Chandimal wants a run after dabbing towards point but Thirimanne says no
played off the pads towards midwicket
a short ball that moved away from the right-hander, Chandimal tried to pull from outside off and was beaten
short of a length and quick outside off, Chandimal tries to cut but is beaten once again
Thirimanne stays in his crease and plays a length ball from off stump towards point
length ball angling into the right-hander, Chandimal works it off his pads through square leg
full ball just outside off stump, Thirimanne tries to drive through cover and is beaten, that nearly bowled him
short and wide outside off, Thirimanne cuts but straight to Warner on the bounce, Warner sends Chandimal hurrying back into his crease at the non-striker's end with a swift throw
Thirimanne cuts and gets a thick outside edge towards third man, Christian's bowling a lot of slower balls
Chandimal turns the ball off his pads into the gap behind square and runs hard, converting a single into two

There's a run out! Chandimal's gone. But the umpire's is checking if Hilfenhaus made a clean save on the boundary. Thirimanne cut the ball hard towards the point boundary, and Hilfenhaus make a sliding save. However as he threw the ball back into play, his foot touched the boundary rope. Chandimal attempted the third run and was run out by a long long way. But he gets a life line. It was a relay throw from Hilfenhaus, he threw it to the fielder at point, who returned it to Wade.
pushed down the ground for a single
played towards backward point for a single
full ball outside off stump, driven from the crease towards mid off
played off the pads through square leg for a single
short of a length outside off stump, Chandimal tries to cut and gets beaten
dabbed from the crease towards point
played towards fine leg for a single
Chandimal plays off the front foot towards midwicket
Chandimal tries to make room by moving towards leg, Doherty follows him with a flat ball, Chandimal has to defend on the off side
cut off the back foot through point, Thirimanne waited on the back foot and used the room
Thirimanne pushes the ball towards long on for a single
played off the back foot with an open face towards third man
short of a length outside off, Chandimal cuts hard, beating point who dived to his left, and beating Doherty at third man, who ran to his right and dived full length
Pattinson responds by hitting a good length just outside off and beating the bat
full and wide outside off, Chandimal lays into the ball with a fierce cover drive off the front foot, he made great contact but placed it to the fielder at cover
too straight from Pattinson, allows Chandimal to glance the ball off his pads to fine leg
Pattinson angles the ball into the left-hander from round the wicket, Thirimanne closes the face of the bat and plays to deep backward square
Thirimanne steps out of his crease and drives the ball through the gap at cover, not hit hard enough to reach the boundary
nudged off the front foot behind square for a single
Thirimanne gets hit on the pad after missing a glance, there's an appeal for lbw but it pitched outside leg stump
pushed towards cover from the crease
Thirimanne whips the ball past the diving fielder at midwicket and collects two more
he sweeps this time but can't beat square leg
full ball on the pads, Chandimal misses the flick but runs a leg bye after getting hit on the pad
Thirimanne makes room and then throws his bat at a short of a length ball outside off, gets a thick edge towards third man
Chandimal moves his front foot to create hitting space and then swings hard, he mis-times the shot but has enough power on it to just clear Christian at mid-on
played towards cover point for a single

caught at mid-off! Chandimal's gone this time. He was on the front foot and he tried to hit down the ground, the length wasn't short enough for that shot and he holed out to McKay at mid-off. He's made 75, an excellent innings. Pattinson's taken his third wicket.
full and fast, on off stump, Mathews gets behind the line and defends
dabbed off the front foot towards cover for a single
Mathews stays in his crease and defends on the off side
driven from the crease towards long off
nudged close on the off side for a quick single, the fielders are on the edge of the circle
punched off the back foot towards extra cover, they wait to see if the fielder can stop it before running. He can't, so they run
played off the back foot towards point
A slower ball on a good length outside off, pushed on the off side for a single
a slower ball outside off, Thirimanne tries to dab behind point and is beaten
quicker this time, angling into the left-hander from round the wicket, Thirimanne opens the face and steers towards third man
another slower ball, from over the wicket to the right-hander, Mathews drops it close to his feet and runs
slow again outside off, Thirimanne makes room by moving towards leg and plays it past point
nudged off the hips towards fine leg

caught, splendidly caught! The ball was a slightly slower one outside off stump and Mathews was on the front foot and into his shot too early. He tried to check it but ended up spooning the ball in the air down the ground. Doherty ran quickly from mid-on towards the boundary, covered a lot of ground, and took the catch as the ball dropped over his head
Thirimanne tries to cut but is beaten
Thirimanne drives the ball in the air but through cover
played from the crease through cover point
tries to drive through the off side but gets a thick edge towards third man
slower ball to end the over, defended on the off side
nudged off the pads behind square for a single
Perera was trying to play the ball on the leg but ended up pushing towards cover. He took on David Hussey but would have been short had Hussey hit at the bowler's end
Thirimanne makes room and dabs the ball towards third man
a slower ball cramps Perera for room, he plays on the off side and runs
Thirimanne makes room once again and plays behind point

it's slow again from McKay and Perera pulls towards deep midwicket. Thirimanne begins the second run but then slips, the throw from the deep is poor so he has time to scramble back into his crease. Perera actually began the second and then stopped, forcing Perera to turn around
cut hard from the crease towards third man
slower ball from round the wicket, chipped over the infield at cover

caught on the deep midwicket boundary! Michael Hussey takes a special kind of catch, one that is becoming less rare these days. Perera swung hard and hit the ball high towards deep midwicket, Hussey ran back and settled under the ball and took the catch inside play. He realised he was going to go over the boundary so he threw the ball up, stepped over the rope, stepped back in, and caught the ball again.

lbw! The ball is full and straight, Senanayake moves across his crease and tries to play on the leg side by closing the face of his bat, he misses and is hit in front, that would have clipped leg stump

a hat-trick for Christian! He bowled a full ball that swung into the right-hander, Kulasekara did what Senanayake did, moved across and tried to flick. He missed and got hit on the pad, this looked like it was missing leg but the umpire didn't think so. Christian is mobbed by his team-mates.
full ball from Christian, dug out on the off side
Thirimanne makes room and opens the face to steer towards third man
Herath opens the face and steers towards third man
slower ball from round the wicket, Thirimanne opens the face and plays behind point again
a full ball down leg side, Herath moves towards the off and tries to glance but misses
Herath taps the ball towards third man and rotates strike
Thirimanne makes room and dabs another slower ball towards third man
Herath moves forward and defends a slower ball
full ball from round the wicket, driven from the crease towards cover
Thirimanne stays in his crease and waits for the ball to reach him before opening the face to play towards third man
Herath tries to drive through the off but gets an inside edge towards midwicket
short of a length outside off stump, Herath tries to cut but gets beaten
in the blockhole from Christian, played back to the bowler
Herath moves forward and tries to drive a full ball outside off, he gets beaten. A hat-trick in Christian's last over, only one run in this one.
full ball on the stumps, Thirimanne makes room and drives through cover point
Herath swings hard at a length ball outside off and gets a top edge that flies down to third man and clears the boundary. Doesn't matter how they come, eh? That ball landed on the rope
Herath pulls, a short-arm pull through square leg
Thirimanne cuts the ball towards third man for a single
Herath is turning on the aggression. He pulls another short of a length ball towards deep square leg. Feisty batting.
shot! Thirimanne makes room and drives the ball in the air inside out through cover point, placing it wide enough to beat Michael Hussey on the boundary
played on the off side, the bowler runs across to prevent the single
Herath flays at a full ball outside off stump and gets another outside edge towards third man, along the ground this time
Thirimanne drives firmly to David Hussey at cover, there was a fumble else there could have been a run out
Herath's swinging at everything now, this one isn't short enough to pull and he gets beaten
full outside off stump once again, Herath gets beaten
Herath drives a full ball to cover and sets off for a single, he beats David Hussey's throw to the bowler
full ball on off stump, driven from the crease through point
Thirimanne gets to his half-century by cutting to point, the fielder doesn't attempt a throw, perhaps because no one was backing up
full ball outside off stump, Herath gets beaten and Thirimanne steals a bye, Wade throws at the bowler's end to try and run out Herath, he missed
Thirimanne throws his bat at a wide out outside off and bottom edges towards third man

Herath clears his front foot out of the way and biffs the ball towards long-on, Thirimanne wants the second and begins to run it but is sent back by Herath, Christian's throw to Wade wasn't good, it was wide of the stumps, and Wade missed his throw at the stumps, else Thirimanne would have been run out
he's been bowled off the middle of the bat! Thirimanne moved across his stumps to try and scoop the ball over fine leg, he made decent contact, but deflected the ball on to his stumps
wide outside off stump but the umpire doesn't call it
Herath swings and misses, Wade collects and throws at the bowler's end and misses, he concedes an overthrow towards long-off
Malinga makes room and clubs the ball down the ground towards long on, they are sprinting between the wickets and come back for the second
Malinga swings and misses, they don't run a bye this time. Wade was keeping with only his left glove on, so that he can throw the ball quicker
once again Wade collects with only one glove on after the ball beats the bat, and is ready to throw if the batsmen try to steal a bye
bowled him! Christian finishes with five wickets. Malinga moved way across his stumps to glance towards fine leg and he missed. The ball was straight and hit middle stump.

inn2.comm: Malinga begins with a low leg-stump full toss that is clipped off the pads towards deep backward square leg
that is a harsh call for wide outside off stump, it wasn't outside those guiding tram lines
another low full toss, outside off stump, Wade moves forward and drives through extra cover, timing it well enough to reach the boundary
a slower ball on middle and off, Wade defends on the off side
played with an open face towards point, Malinga's length is full again
Wade has a go at one that's wide outside off stump and gets beaten
Wade moves forward and defends a length ball towards cover point, Malinga controlled damage nicely after a poor start
short and wide outside off, hit me please. Warner stays in his crease and cuts the ball through cover to get off the mark
length ball on the pads, Warner moves across and nudges towards square leg
defended on the back foot towards backward point
Sanga fumbles the take after the batsman lets it go outside off stump, but the slip fielders mop up
the line is too straight at gentle pace, allowing the batsman to work off the pads towards square leg
Warner tries to drive on the up but slices it towards point
a slower ball on middle stump, Wade drops it close on the leg side and the batsmen run a quick single
length ball around off stump, Warner stays in his crease and steers the ball towards third man
Wade stands in his crease and opens the face to steer towards third man this time
that was measured at 127 kph but it seemed slower, the line was straight. Defended on the off side off the back foot

caught at short cover! The length ball seemed to grip on the pitch and come on to Warner slower than he expected. He was already well through his swat by the time he made contact. He still hit the ball off the middle though and it went quickly to Perera at short cover, splendid reflex catch
Watson strides forward to a length ball outside off and steers it through the gap between point and backward point

lbw! Kulasekara pitched the ball in line with the stumps from over the wicket and angled it across the left-hander, Wade moved across his crease to play on the leg side and was hit on the back pad. Height might have been the only issue but that looked pretty good. The umpire thought so too. The MCG comes to life, there are so many Sri Lankan fans today and they are cheering themselves hoarse. Replays indicate that height was no problem, and the ball was going to just shave off stump
short of a length and straight. Defended on the off side
Forrest swishes and gets beaten outside off stump
that's down leg side and Sangakkara leaps to his left to collect
Forrest stays in his crease and opens the face to play behind point
good length around off stump, Forrest defends from his crease towards the bowler
that's too straight, allowing Forrest to whip the ball off his pads towards long leg
Forrest is giving the bowler a good view of his stumps, his stance gives him room to play towards point
too full and too straight, Watson moves forward and across to clip the ball with power through midwicket
short of a length and wide outside off stump, Watson comes forward and cuts towards third man
left alone outside off stump
Forrest gets behind the line of a fuller ball and defends on the off side

edged and caught behind! The ball was ordinary, short and wide, there to be hit to the boundary. But Forrest tried to cut it with no foot movement and threw his bat out a long way away from his body. He got a huge and loud edge through to Sangakkara.
Watson tries to drive through cover but mis-times it into the ground
Watson tries to steer the ball towards third man but there's a fielder in the way
played from the crease towards point
Watson comes forward and defends on the off side
Watson plays this one towards midwicket, five consecutive dots
too full and too straight, Watson moves across and works the ball through square leg
good length and very straight, Hussey defends towards the bowler
good length but the line is down leg side
good length outside off stump, Hussey strides out and forward arms
good leave, close to off stump, Malinga's upping his pace now
good length on middle and off, Hussey pushes off the front foot towards cover
Malinga loses his line, firing it down leg side, Sangakkara should have stopped that though, but it's cost Sri Lanka five extras
played off the front foot towards the off side
good length and straight, Hussey defends towards cover
nudged away into the off side off the front foot
short of a good length outside off, rocks forward and defends it into the off side
good length on the off, rocks forward and pushes it on the up past extra cover for a single
short of a good length on middle, Hussey rocks back and defends it into the off side
slightly short on leg stump, gets on the back foot and pats it back down the pitch
shortish on the off, Hussey gets his body behind that one nicely and defends it in the off side
pitched on the off stump, drives it firmly towards mid-on off the front foot
shortish outside off, cut down towards third man for a single
shortish on leg stump, turns it behind square for a quick single
back of a length outside off, punches it towards cover, straight to the fielder
angling in towards middle, gets front and across and works it towards midwicket
short of a good length on the off, gets back and punches it to the bowler
pushed it full on leg stump, it's driven straight to midwicket
short of a good length on middle, Hussey moves right back and knocks it into the off side
slightly short on leg stump, aiming well, Hussey drops it down in front of the bowler
plenty of width this time, errs in line and is punished, Hussey sees an opportunity and promptly dispatches that one through point
on leg and middle, Hussey gets across slightly and plays it watchfully to midwicket
in the channel just outside off stump, steps forward, opens the face slightly and guides it to point
short of a good length outside off, is a legcutter, Watson tries to cut but can't make contact
short of a good length on the off, gets forward and taps it towards point
back of a length on the off, Watson stands tall and offers the full face
bowled on a good length on the off, defended solidly in front of the short extra cover fielder
angling in towards middle and leg, flicked away wide of fine leg for a couple of runs, good wristwork there
short of a good length on the off, gets forward and taps it in front of cover
the first ball is down leg side from round the wicket and Hussey misses the pull
Watson goes back and cuts towards cover where Chandimal dives and stops the ball
defended on the leg side
played off the back foot on the off side
tossed up on middle stump, defended on the front foot towards the off side
defended from the crease towards the off side again
Hussey moves across and nudges behind square
good length and straight from Mathews, Watson defends on the off side
a little width outside off and Watson stays in his crease to cut towards third man
good length on middle stump, Hussey gets behind the line and defends
pushed from the crease towards cover
Hussey watchfully defends towards the bowler

short and wide outside off stump, after so many tight deliveries, Hussey pounces, cutting hard towards point. Dilshan is in the way, though, and he dives full length towards his left to bring the ball down. Saved four runs.
Watson works the ball through midwicket for a single
Hussey comes forward and dabs on the leg side
Hussey moves back and pushes towards square leg
Watson clips the ball off his pads through square to bring up the 50 for Australia
Hussey strides forward and nudges on the off side, he wants one, Watson doesn't
tight line and length on middle and off, Hussey defends from his crease

shot! Mathews does well to not get hurt. Watson thumped the ball off the front foot back at the bowler, technically it was a catch, because Mathews got a hand to it. The ball deflected and went towards the long-on boundary
Watson tries to drive but gets an inside edge towards square leg
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
the length is fuller and the line just outside off, Watson dabs the ball past a wide slip towards third man
Hussey stays in his crease and defends towards point
Hussey gets drawn on to the front foot and beaten by a good length ball that pitches around off and seams away
good length on off stump, Watson defends
Watson comes forward and defends on the leg side
short ball and Watson hammers through square leg. That was hit in the air in the vicinity of Chandimal and the square leg umpire, both men could have been in danger. He smashed it
played behind square for two more
defended back to the bowler
Watson moves forward and drives the ball through midwicket
short of a length close to off from over the wicket, Watson stays in his crease and opens the face to play towards third man
Hussey opens the face this time, to play towards third man
Watson moves back and nudges the ball off his thigh towards square leg
Chandimal threw at the keeper's end and Sangakkara did well to dive and save overthrows. The ball was played towards cover for a quick single
that's too full on the pads, Watson clips the ball through square leg and the ball screams across the turf to the boundary
decent length outside off, played towards third man for a single
Watson moves forward and defends
Watson goes back and flicks for a single
Hussey steps out and clips the ball through midwicket
Hussey moves back again and dabs towards square leg
Watson gets on to the front foot and defends
Watson moves forward and hits the ball hard into the ground towards midwicket, where Dilshan dives to his left and fields
good length around off stump, defended on the back foot towards point
that's only a bit short and Hussey launches it over midwicket with a powerful pull, he hit that flat and hard
full ball outside off, Hussey moves forward and drives the ball along the ground through cover, superb timing
defended on the off side
good length on leg and middle, Hussey nudges towards midwicket and runs
width outside off, so Watson cuts towards third man
Watson steps out and defends on the off side
defended on the off side
short ball and Watson loses balance as he pulls, maybe tried to hit it a bit too hard
Hussey nudges the ball into the gap at midwicket and runs, the bowler has to field it himself
Watson moves forward and turns the ball off his pads to square leg
there he goes! Watson down on one knee and swinging the bat hard, lofting the ball towards the midwicket boundary, the ball falls wide of the fielder for a one-bounce four
defended from the crease on the off side
cut off the back foot towards third man
good length and straight, medium pace from Thirimanne, Watson drives to long-on
Hussey pushes through cover off the front foot
Watson gets on the front foot, lines up a length ball, and swings hard to send the ball straight back over the bowler's head
Watson defends on the front foot and gets an inside edge on to the pad
Hussey gets down and across, paddling the ball on the full towards fine leg
Watson defends on the leg side
Watson stays in his crease and defends again
Watson works the ball off his pads behind square
Watson brings up the 100 with a dab off the pads
pushed into the gap between cover and point for one
Hussey gets beaten poking outside off stump
full ball on the pads, clipped through midwicket
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Wason gets to his fifty by lofting the ball past the bowler, not really a chance
Watson gets on to the front foot and hits the ball hard through cover
short ball, Hussey pulls through midwicket
Hussey stays in his crease, gets behind the line, and blocks
Hussey goes back and plays behind point
Hussey steers off the back foot again but doesn't beat point
played back towards the bowler on the back foot
Hussey nudges towards point off the front foot and runs
Watson nudges the ball off his pads behind square
length ball outside off, Watson cuts towards deep point and the batsmen take on the throw from the deep from Tharanga and run the second
played through cover for a single
full ball on the pads, Hussey clips through midwicket
defended on the front foot on the off side
Watson strides forward and drills the ball back past the bowler

caught behind! Thirimanne has struck for Sri Lanka, would you believe it! Hussey stayed in his crease and poked at the ball angling across him, it was a thick edge and Sangakkara did well to catch it standing up to the stumps
huge appeal for lbw after Watson pushes forward and gets hit on the pad. That was going on with the arm and looked like it would have missed leg stump
played on the off side for a single
Hussey gets off the mark by turning the ball of his pads behind square
Hussey nudges off the front foot to Chandimal at short square leg
defended on the off side
Hussey calls for two as soon as he drives the ball through cover and into the gap in the deep
nudged off the front foot on the leg side
Watson moves forward and drives the ball in the air but wide of the fielder at short cover
Hussey uses the width outside off to cut the ball past Dilshan at point
width outside off once again and Hussey cuts towards deep point, Kulasekara sprints to his right along the boundary and dives to save one run
played off the front foot towards cover point
Watson strides forward and defends to cover
Watson moves forward and across and works the ball through midwicket
short ball and Watson pulls towards deep midwicket
Hussey nudges the ball from his crease behind square
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
defended on the leg side
Hussey cashes in on the leg-stump line and sweeps with power to the square leg boundary
defended on the front foot towards the off side
good length and straight, Watson dabs towards square leg and runs
short and wide outside off, Hussey reaches for it without moving his feet and makes no contact
good length close to off stump, left alone by the batsman
Hussey got an inside edge on to the pad against a straight delivery, else that would have been dead plumb
played from the crease towards cover
full and straight, Hussey plays the ball to mid-on
Watson steps out of his crease and clips the ball off his pads through midwicket
driven off the front foot towards long-off
bowled flat and down leg side, that's a wide
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Watson defends back to Herath once again
Watson steps out and drives the ball to long on
driven off the front foot past the bowler to mid-on, they run a quick single and the throw to the keeper is poor
short and wide outside off, cut to the fielder at deep point
Malinga digs it in short, the batsmen sways and bends his knees to let the bouncer pass
another short ball, this time Watson pulls, a controlled shot along the ground
full and straight, played down the ground and the runs needed by Australia dip below 100
played off the front foot towards midwicket

bowled him! That's full and straight, a little bit of swing into the right-hander. Watson tried to play across the line towards midwicket and missed. The ball crashed into middle stump and flattened it. Sri Lanka have made a tremendous breakthough
played back to the bowler from the crease
driven firmly, Herath dives full stretch to his left to field
Hussey goes back to cut but gets an inside edge into the ground near his boot
nudged off the pad to the fielder at short square leg
defended on the front foot on the off side
Hussey nudges the ball behind square
good length outside off, Christian shoulders arms, that was 146 kph. The crowd were roaring as Malinga ran in, great atmosphere at the G
full ball on the pads, Christian clips it in the air through midwicket
a slower and straight full toss, Christian wasn't fooled, he met it with a straight and sure bat
143 kph on a good length outside off, Christian tries to defend but gets beaten
good length and straight, Christian gets behind the line and defends
that looked like a slower bouncer outside off stump, Christian let it go through to Sanga
Hussey uses the width outside off to cut to the third man boundary, poor line and length to start with after the break
played down the ground to long on for a single
Christian pushes off the front foot towards point and runs
played off the front foot through point

caught and bowled! Has that carried? The ball stopped on Christian as he pushed at it, lobbing it back to the bowler, Senanayake dived forward and just got his fingers under the ball. The umpires refer it to the third umpire but Christian begins to walk after he sees the replay on the big screen
The Sri Lankans appeal for a catch down leg side after Pattinson misses the glance, there were two sounds but maybe the ball brushed pad
his first ball is short and extremely far down leg side
hit off the back foot through cover for a single
pushed on the front foot towards point
Pattinson gets on to the front foot and blocks
played off the back foot towards cover
that's too short, Pattinson goes back and uses the width to cut the ball behind point to the boundary
Pattinson goes back again and cuts from off stump towards cover
a bit too short but Hussey can't cut it past Malinga at point
fuller length and Hussey drives it into the gap at extra cover, they run extremely well between wickets and complete three
punched off the back foot towards the bowler's right, Senanayake dives and makes the save
played firmly off the pads to midwicket, where there's another diving save
played towards cover off the back foot
cut off the back foot to the fielder at backward point, the crowd is cheering every dot ball
driven of the front foot through point and the runnign between the wickets is slick
Hussey stays in his crease and punches through cover
length ball around off stump, Pattinson stays in his crease and plays to cover
played from the crease towards point where Dilshan makes a lazy attempt of picking up with one hand and misses the ball
full and straight, driven off the front foot towards cover
Hussey drives towards cover but watches his shot blocked by Senanayake who dives to his left
defended from the crease
worked off the pads towards square leg
Hussey attacks, lofting the ball flat but high enough to clear the fielder at mid-off, a game of chess this is becoming
played back to the bowler this time
Hussey comes forward and drives the ball towards Malinga at point
Hussey gets on the front foot and taps the ball down to long-on
driven firmly back towards the bowler and Kulasekara fields it, not cleanly, but well enough to prevent a single
defended from the crease towards point
played off the front foot towards cover

a huge appeal for lbw after Hussey gets hit on the pad, I think there was an inside edge there, the ball went to the keeper, and Sanga underarmed it on to the stumps. Asad Rauf has had a word with Mahela about that appeal. Replays indicate no inside edge, but the ball was just grazing the stumps. So fair call from the umpire
defended on the front foot towards the off side
played off the front foot towards midwicket, Kulasekara has bowled a maiden
played back to the bowler from the crease
the bowler leaps to his left to parry the ball toward the fielder at midwicket, preventing the single
Pattinson goes back and tries to cut but is beaten
that's down leg side and a wide
Pattinson gets an inside edge on to the pad
forced of the back foot through midwicket
Pattinson releases some pressure by driving the ball in the air over cover to add three more runs
Pattinson goes back to defend and gets hit on the pad
quicker and straighter ball, Pattinson plays off the back foot to midwicket

caught at midwicket! Sri Lanka edge closer to that spot in the finals. Pattinson clips the ball firmly off his pads, but it's in the air and straight to Dilshan. He has injured fingers but he's taken that catch easily. The strong Sri Lankan contingent at the MCG party a little harder.
flat ball on off and middle, defended on the front foot
McKay was aiming for midwicket but the ball was slower and he hit it in the air through square leg
driven back to the bowler, Herath dives to his left to prevent the single
a full toss on off stump, a real loose ball, but it's played to cover
played off the back foot towards long on
Hussey comes forward and works the ball through square leg
driven off the front foot towards long off for one more
Hussey collects a single to long-on
McKay goes back and pushes towards point
that's swung in the air behind square but it falls short of the fielder in the deep
driven off the front foot to long-on
McKay nudges off the front foot towards midwicket
cut off the back foot, there's a fumble at point but no run taken

McKay's been run out! Hussey pushed the ball towards cover and set off for a single, Dilshan slipped while fielding but still fired the throw to Sangakkara, who whipped off the bails with the bat just short. And listen to that roar when the third umpire sends McKay on his way, tremendous.
Doherty strides forward and defends on the off side
slower ball outside off stump, Hussey plays it through cover point and runs one, and then sprints back for the second. The throw is to Sangakkara and he breaks the stumps, Hussey is home safe though
Hussey drives to long off and gets only one this time
that's too full and on the pads, Doherty clips the ball firmly to deep square leg
a yorker and Hussey somehow edges it past the fielder at short fine leg, the fielder from deep square leg runs to his right and slides to save the four
once again Malinga's line to the left hander is poor, on leg stump, Doherty dabs towards midwicket and runs, Malinga has to do the fielding himself
full and straight, Hussey drives to long-on to retain strike
that's a great shot! Hussey attacks Kulasekara, carting him to the extra cover boundary to reach his half-century. Superb innings, dragging Australia ahead
in the blockhole outside off stump, Hussey gets beaten
in the blockhole once again, Hussy squeezes it out to point for a single
Doherty was well out of his crease as he met the ball on the full, pushing towards mid-off for a single
Hussey makes room and then jams down on a full ball outside off, placing it behind point towards Herath at wide third man
full outside off once again, Hussey drives to deep cover and retains strike
Hussey beats the fielder at extra cover with the drive but the man at long-off runs in quickly to prevent the second run
cut off the back foot through point
Hussey steps out of his crease and plays to Kulasekara at short fine leg, the throw is awful but Doherty had run too far past the crease to capitalise and take an overthrow
defended on the leg side
Doherty defends watchfully back to the bowler, the crowd cheer, but Doherty is keeping a cool head here
that's fired down leg side, a costly extra for Sri Lanka
full ball on leg stump, but Doherty can't get it past midwicket
played with soft hands close on the off side for a quick single, the fielder from point picks up and throws down the stumps at the bowler's end, but Doherty is safe
full and wide outside off, Hussey drives it in the air, the fielder at cover dives to his left and gets hands to it but the ball goes past him towards the deep, a tough chance
pulled to Chandimal at midwicket, a direct hit at the bowler's end would have dismissed Hussey
a low full toss outside off, Doherty pushes towards long off for a single, Malinga's line is all over the place
full toss once again, allowing Hussey to drive easily through cover and retain strike
shot! Hussey has charged Herath and sent the ball into the stands with a clean swing of the bat, straight as the proverbial arrow
two two two, says Hussey the moment he clips the ball through midwicket, he runs superbly as well
two two two, he calls once again after playing the ball through square. Doherty says no, and they settle for one. the second would have been supremely risky for the batsmen
Doherty defends towards backward point, Hussey decides not to run
Doherty tries to cut but gets beaten outside off stump
driven firmly but straight to the bowler, a tight finish from Herath after that first-ball six
a full ball on off stump, Hussey mis-times the ball towards midwicket

caught! Malinga bowls a straight ball, the length is full and the pace is slow. Doherty is early on the shot and spoons the ball in the air over the bowler's head. Dilshan called for it early, ran to his right from mid-on, and took an easy catch
full ball wide outside off stump, Hussey digs it out past the fielder at point and runs the second before the fielder from third man can run to his right and prevent it. Poor line once again
full and straight, Hussey drives the ball down the ground and long-off runs in fast to prevent the second, Dilshan was the fielder and he was quick
a full toss and Malinga is appealing for something, I think it hit the inside edge and then went on to the pad and past the keeper, they did not run
phew, that's a fast ball outside off, close to the stumps, Hilfenhaus gets beaten but he also survives, Hussey to face the start of the final over

Sri Lanka have won! Hussey has been caught at long off, and listen to the MCG erupt! Mahela Jayawardene is ecstatic. Hussey decided to attack Kulasekara and lofted him down the ground, he hit the full ball flat but not far enough, Dilshan was the man at long-off and he held the catch to send the fans at the MCG into wild celebrations. Sri Lanka have played a tremendous game and are in the finals
